name: discreet
content:

C2 careful not to cause embarrassment or attract too much attention, especially by keeping something secret: The family made discreet enquiries about his background. They are very good assistants, very discreet - they wouldn't go talking to the press. Opposite
indiscreetCompare
circumspect formalNote: Do not confuse with discrete.
